title: Two Jubo Dal men shot in Coxâ€™s Bazar
body: Unidentified assailants shot two activists of Jubo Dal, the youth wing of BNP, in the Uttaran Residential Area of Cox's Bazar on Tuesday night. Saiful Islam, 35, and Mohammad Faruq, 34, are from Larpora area. The attackers arrived on a motorcycle, wearing helmets, opened fire, and fled the scene around 10:30pm, leaving Saiful and Faruq critically injured. Locals rushed them to Cox's Bazar Sadar Hospital, from where they were referred to Chattogram, police said. Azizul Haque Sohel, president of the Cox's Bazar municipal Jubo Dal unit, demanded that the police promptly identify and arrest the perpetrators. Sami Uddin, officer-in-charge of Cox's Bazar Sadar Model Police Station, said an investigation has been launched to identify the attackers, and legal steps will follow.
